channel.title: Medical Typist
channel.description:
So i have been trying to find a typing sort of job, none are within distance to travel to, except medical typists.
My mother is a high ranked nurse at a huge hospital not far from me, transport is easy and im almost certain they would need some sort of 'medical typists'
Would this be hard, my question is? im a fast typer, but having to type medical words could become a problem (as i have never used a medical word in my life, i can only imagine all those long confusing words)

item.title: Medical Typist
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Dude I think my girlfriend’s mom does this.

She sits at her laptop at home and listens to medical things and types up huge things.

Read full topic
